reachingZeroHP.description: When a creature is reduced to 0 HP, they are typically rendered unconscious and are in a dying state.

woundThresholds.description: If an attack reduces a target's HP below a Wound Threshold, or if it's a Called Shot, the target suffers a debilitating injury.

stabilizing.action: Make a Medicine check as an action to stabilize a dying creature.
stabilizing.effect: A stabilized creature is no longer in immediate danger of dying but remains unconscious.

specialRules.name: The Survivor (Birth Sign)
specialRules.effect: Once per day, when a character would be reduced to 0 HP, they can choose to be reduced to 1 HP instead.
